test.instr: (:ins (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y washmachine))) (:task (putdown X) (:cond (sort X cup))) (:task (open X) (:cond (sort X washmachine))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (color X black) (sort X remotecontrol))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X washmachine))) (:cons_not (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X washmachine)))) )
test.nl: Take the can out the washmachine. Put down the cup. Open the washmachine. Pick up the black remotecontrol. The washmachine is opened. The washmachine is not closed.
